ohu lokaya thula rata thaba balana hati, 'handa saha niwyork nuwara' yana rachanayenda, wishwaya thula pruthiwiya thaba balana hati ‘chandraga්rahanaya’ yana rachanayen da kiya pawe ya.‘handa saha niwyork nuwara’ rachanayehi mul ada mese ya: kalu gahi tharagayata ihala giya simenthi biththi misaka asata nilata ahasak gahak kolak awatak natha, niwyorknam purawara siyak mahal ektamgeya mudune dorajanel wasa sira kala kamarayaka andak - putuwak - mesayak -mama, mama polowe anith paththe senehathi demapiyan na mithuran ambau daruwan mata sihi weyi.
